mapper.select:
select c.*,CONCAT(u.firstName,u.lastName) as userName,u.mobilePhone as userPhone, CONCAT(w.firstName,w.lastName) as waiterName,w.mobilePhone as waiterPhone from complain c join user_info u on c.uid=u.uid left join user_info w on c.wid=w.uid
where c.status=#{status} order by c.createDate desc

select c.*,CONCAT(u.firstName,u.lastName) as userName,u.mobilePhone as userPhone, m.status as menuStatus,m.dishsMoney,m.carriageMoney, CONCAT(w.firstName,w.lastName) as waiterName,w.mobilePhone as waiterPhone from complain c left join user_info u on c.uid=u.uid left join user_info w on c.wid=w.uid
left join menu m on c.mid=m.mid
left join market_menu m on c.mid=m.mid
where c.comId=#{comId}
